All Classes

Class Description
Button
The Button Component allows the user to interact with a visual element via mouse movement and clicks
Button.HORIZONTAL_TEXT_ALIGN
The available horizontal alignment modes
Button.STATE
The available button states
Button.VERTICAL_TEXT_ALIGN
The available vertical alignment modes
CollisionController
CollisionController is responsible for checking for collisions between entities running inside the game.
CollisionController.COLLISION_TYPE
Used by collision logic to detect if the game collision is a WALL, or an EDGE.
CollisionElement  
ColouredComponent
A coloured version of the Component class, providing storage, setting and getting of the colour used for this component
Component
The core component class, used to abstract common information from UI elements, such as position and size.
Controller  
CoreEngine
This class is the underlying engine that drives the game; it is used to draw information from the game's state to the JFrame associated.
DeathFragment
The DeathFragment is displayed when the game has ended.
DirectGhostEntity
The DirectGhostEntity is a ghost that directly follows the Pacman as efficiently as possible - It attempts to find the shortest path to the player.
Effect
The Effect class is responsible for animating effects inside the game window
EffectController
EffectController facilitates the spawning and animation of effects in the game
EffectFrame  
EngineComponent  
Entity  
Entity.DIRECTION
The available directions of movement for an entity
EntityController
The EntityController class handles the adding, removal, updating and drawing of onscreen elements, such as PacmanEntity, ghosts, and associated pickups
FlankGhostEntity
The FlankGhostEntity is a ghost that attempts to cut off Pacman - It attempts to path find efficiently to a location infront of the pacman.
Fragment
Abstracted functionality for game fragments is kept here
FruitPointPickup
The FruitPointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and increase the players extra lives if any are missing (max.
FruitPointPickup.PICKUP_TYPE  
GameFragment
This fragment is used to display the current score of the players
GhostEntity
The abstract GhostEntity class is used to store the pathfinding logic used by the various different ghosts.
GhostEntity.STATE  
InvalidMapException  
InvalidParameterException  
InvalidPathFindingException  
Label
The Label class is used to display a single line of text on the game screen
LargePointPickup
The same as a normal PointPickup, but gives the user additional points and appears on the map as a larger dot.
Map
The Map class is used to contain all relevant information about a particular level; All levels are loaded at start-up, and their map file is parsed, checked and stored to be used by the game when spawning Pacman, ghosts, walls, and point pickups.
MapController
The MapController is responsible for storing all the Pacman levels, and providing these levels to the game on request.
MenuFragment
This fragment is used to display the main menu
PacmanEntity
The PacmanEntity handles the drawing, animations, collisions, pickups, etc of the player/pacman.
PacmanGame
Base class for this pacman game; instantiates all core controllers, game engine, entity sprites and runs the main render loop.
PacmanGame.STATE
The possible game states
Panel
The Panel class is used to display a solid, rectangular block of colour; or, the outline of said block.
Path
This class is used to encapsulate the path that an entity must take to reach its destination.
PathFinder
The PathFinder is responsible for calculating the path that a ghost may take to reach the player.
PathFinder.Node
A inner class used to encapsulate information regarding the maps nodes, such as it's cost, position, and depth of path finding at the current moment of calculation.
PauseFragment
This fragment is used to display a pause overlay when the user hits the 'ESCAPE' key.
Pickup
The Pickup class handles some of the backend core functionality of on-screen Pickups
Player
The Player class is used to keep track of the player stats
PointPickup
The PointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and play a sound effect.
RandomPoint
The RandomPoint is used to find a set of co-ordinates that is not colliding with any other entities or the game boundary.
Scoreboard
The Scoreboard class is used to store the top 5 scores achieved in the game.
SoundEffect
The SoundEffect class allows a simple and easy interface to use when loading, playing, or looping sound effects.
SoundEffectException  
SpeedFlankGhostEntity
The SpeedFlankGhostEntity is functions exactly the same as the FlankGhostEntity, however this ghost has the same movement speed as the player, proving to be a very difficult opponent indeed.
SpriteController
The SpriteController is responsible for loading and distributing all sprites to their entities.
Text
A simple class that allows the encapsulation of text information for easier transport of this information inside of classes.
TextFadeEffect
This Effect class is used to show a piece of text, and have it slowly fade out and rise out of position
TextFadeEffect.Frame
This nested class serves to abstract away the information pertaining to each frame of the Effect
UIController
The UIController is responsible for managing and drawing Fragments on screen
UIMouseReactive
